tr.td: * OWU wins toss and defers, Wittenberg will receive and defend S goal
Miles MacKenzie kickoff 65 yards to the WITF0, touchback.
Zack Jenkins left flat pass complete to Zach Culvahouse for loss of 1 yard to the WITF24 (Roemello Cook).
Sean Gary rush up middle for no gain to the WITF24 (Morgan McBride;Dominic Wilson).
Zack Jenkins pass incomplete to Luke Landis.
Will Gingery punt 33 yards to the OWU43, fair catch by Kevin Herman.
Calvin Cagney rush over left end for no gain to the OWU43 (Dustin Holmes).
TEAM rush bad snap for loss of 1 yard to the OWU42 (Evan Killilea).
Dominick Orsini sideline pass incomplete to Erik Wall.
Miles MacKenzie punt 42 yards to the WITF16, downed.
Zack Jenkins curl pass complete to Luke Landis for 7 yards to the WITF23 (Beau Michel).
Jimmy Dehnke rush for 8 yards to the WITF31, 1ST DOWN WITF (Zane Kieffer).
Zack Jenkins post pass complete to Clay Mangen for 19 yards to the 50 yardline, 1ST DOWN WITF.
Jimmy Dehnke rush for 5 yards to the OWU45 (Chris Mondon;Keaton Leppla).
Zack Jenkins sideline pass complete to Corey Stump for 7 yards to the OWU38, 1ST DOWN WITF (Anthony Bryant).
Jimmy Dehnke rush inside handoff for 1 yard to the OWU37 (Gary Brodek;Keaton Leppla).
Zack Jenkins sideline pass complete to Luke Landis for 2 yards to the OWU35.
Sean Gary rush up middle for 3 yards to the OWU32.
Zack Jenkins pass incomplete to Corey Stump, dropped pass.
Kevin Herman rush for 2 yards to the OWU34 (Dwight Hill;Dustin Holmes).
Dominick Orsini right flat pass complete to Tim Shadoan for 4 yards to the OWU38 (Dustin Holmes).
Dominick Orsini pass complete to Tim Shadoan for 8 yards to the OWU46, 1ST DOWN OWU (Ryan Myers).
Kevin Herman rush inside handoff for no gain to the OWU46 (Bobby Saul).
Dominick Orsini rush for no gain to the OWU46 (Dwight Hill;Josh Bannick).
Dominick Orsini rush for 7 yards to the WITF47 (Evan Killilea;Nick Gibson).
PENALTY WITF offside (Dwight Hill) 4 yards to the WITF43, 1ST DOWN OWU.
Dominick Orsini sideline pass complete to Tim Shadoan for 13 yards to the WITF30, 1ST DOWN OWU, out-of-bounds (Ryan Myers;Dustin Holmes).

Dominick Orsini sideline pass complete to Tim Shadoan for loss of 2 yards to the WITF32, fumble by Tim Shadoan recovered by WITF Nick Gibson at WITF32, Nick Gibson for 5 yards to the WITF37 (Tyler McIntosh).
WITTENBERG drive start at 04:33, WITF ball on WITF37.
Sean Gary rush for 2 yards to the WITF39 (Anthony Bryant;Morgan McBride).
Zack Jenkins pass complete to Corey Stump for 10 yards to the WITF49, 1ST DOWN WITF (Roemello Cook).

Dominick Orsini left flat pass complete to Calvin Cagney for 13 yards to the OWU45, 1ST DOWN OWU, out-of-bounds (Dustin Holmes).
Dominick Orsini pass intercepted by Dustin Holmes at the OWU41, Dustin Holmes return 31 yards to the OWU10, out-of-bounds (Calvin Cagney).
Jimmy Dehnke rush inside handoff for no gain to the OWU10 (Chris Mondon).
Zack Jenkins sacked for loss of 3 yards to the OWU13 (Morgan McBride).
Zack Jenkins sacked for loss of 5 yards to the OWU18 (Chase Workman;Gary Brodek).

Kevin Herman rush over left end for 4 yards to the OWU36.
Kevin Herman rush inside handoff for 8 yards to the OWU44, 1ST DOWN OWU (Dustin Holmes;Gabe Cunningham).

Kevin Herman rush up middle for loss of 1 yard to the OWU47 (Nate Fairand).
Dominick Orsini curl pass incomplete to Tim Shadoan, dropped pass.
Miles MacKenzie punt 41 yards to the WITF12, downed.
Zack Jenkins pass incomplete to Luke Landis.
Sean Gary rush for no gain to the WITF12 (Dominic Wilson).
Zack Jenkins rush scramble for 4 yards to the WITF16 (Chase Workman).
Will Gingery punt 72 yards to the OWU12, downed.
Dominick Orsini rush quarterback draw for 5 yards to the OWU17 (Josh Bannick;Gabe Cunningham).
Dominick Orsini right flat pass complete to Calvin Cagney for loss of 6 yards to the OWU11 (Dustin Holmes).
